org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.invoke
Class AePojoHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.invoke.AePojoHandlerFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeInvokeHandlerFactory
public class AePojoHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeInvokeHandlerFactory

Handles the java protocol where the invoke handlers are "plain old java objects" or POJO. The fully qualified class names appear in the custom invoker uri immediately following the protocol but before any query params. i.e. java:com.my.custom.InvokerHandler?name=value The objects are instantiated and cached so they should be reentrant.
